{"9b17dd13-49ec-4796-b2ab-855f8e4923fc":{"id":"9b17dd13-49ec-4796-b2ab-855f8e4923fc","name":"hey","timestamp":1765808410228,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"hey"}],"context":[]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Create a complete Android application called "Kids-Learning" with the following specifications:
Project Overview:
Build a bilingual educational app for children to learn and practice writing Arabic and French alphabets through interactive tracing, sounds, and engaging UI.
Core Features to Implement:

Main Menu Screen:

Two large, colorful buttons: "Arabic Alphabet" and "French Alphabet"
Child-friendly design with bright colors and large touch targets
Simple navigation suitable for young children


Arabic Alphabet Module:

Display complete list of 28 Arabic letters in a RecyclerView grid
Play pronunciation sound when child taps a letter
Open letter tracing screen showing large letter format
Custom Canvas view for finger tracing with stroke detection
"Clear" and "Restart" buttons for tracing
"Repeat Sound" button to replay letter pronunciation


French Alphabet Module:

Display all 26 French letters (A-Z) in a RecyclerView grid
Play letter name sound on tap
Letter tracing screen with Canvas drawing
Clear and restart functionality


Technical Requirements:

Use MVVM or Clean Architecture
Implement Room database to save child's progress
Load alphabet data from local JSON file (offline-first)
Custom Canvas view with touch event handling for letter tracing
MediaPlayer or SoundPool for audio playback
Responsive layouts for both phones and tablets
Support for different screen sizes and orientations
Separate resource files for colors, dimensions, and strings


Design Guidelines:

Material Design 3 components with child-friendly adaptations
Large, easy-to-tap icons and buttons (minimum 60dp)
Bright, primary colors (blues, yellows, greens, reds)
Rounded corners and playful typography
Large fonts (minimum 24sp for text, 48sp for letters)
Smooth animations and transitions
Visual feedback for all interactions


Project Structure:

app/
├── data/
│ ├── model/ (Letter data classes)
│ ├── repository/
│ └── local/ (Room database, JSON loader)
├── ui/
│ ├── main/ (MainActivity)
│ ├── arabic/ (Arabic alphabet screens)
│ ├── french/ (French alphabet screens)
│ └── common/ (Custom Canvas view, adapters)
├── utils/ (Helper classes, sound manager)
└── res/
 ├── raw/ (audio files for letters)
 ├── assets/ (alphabets.json)
 └── layout/, values/, drawable/

Key Components:

Create custom LetterTracingView extending View with Canvas
Implement SoundManager singleton for audio handling
Create Letter data class with properties: character, soundResourceId, unicodeValue
Use ViewBinding for all layouts
Implement RecyclerView adapters for letter grids
Add smooth animations using ObjectAnimator


Performance Requirements:

Optimize for devices with 2GB RAM minimum
Lazy load sounds to prevent memory issues
Efficient Canvas rendering (60fps target)
Quick app startup (under 2 seconds)



Generate complete, production-ready code including:

All Activity/Fragment files with lifecycle management
Custom views with proper touch handling
Repository and database setup
JSON file structure and parser
Resource files (colors.xml, dimens.xml, strings.xml)
Gradle dependencies
Proper error handling and null safety

Make the app delightful for children aged 3-7 with smooth interactions, encouraging sounds, and an intuitive interface that requires no reading skills to navigate."}],"context":[]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"**Outlining initial project approach**

I’m going to begin by reviewing the current project structure to get a clear picture of its state. Then I’ll gather requirements and prepare a to-do list focusing on building an MVVM, offline-first Android app with Room, ensuring child-friendly design, before diving into directory listings or file com.alphabeto.data.local\n\nimport androidx.room.ColumnInfo\nimport androidx.room.Entity\nimport androidx.room.PrimaryKey\nimport com.alphabeto.data.model.AlphabetLanguage\n\n@Entity(tableName = \"letter_progress\")\ndata class LetterProgressEntity(\n @PrimaryKey\n @ColumnInfo(name = \"letter_key\")\n val letterKey: String,\n @ColumnInfo(name = \"language\")\n val language: AlphabetLanguage,\n @ColumnInfo(name = \"character\")\n val character: String,\n @ColumnInfo(name = \"is_completed\")\n val isCompleted: Boolean,\n @ColumnInfo(name = \"traced_strokes\")\n val tracedStrokes: Int,\n @ColumnInfo(name = \"updated_at\")\n val updatedAt: Long\n) {\n companion object {\n fun create(language: AlphabetLanguage, character: String): LetterProgressEntity {\n return LetterProgressEntity(\n letterKey = buildKey(language, character),\n language = language,\n character = character,\n isCompleted = false,\n tracedStrokes = 0,\n updatedAt = System.currentTimeMillis()\n )\n }\n\n fun buildKey(language: AlphabetLanguage, character: String): String =\n \"${'$'}language-${'$'}character\"\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"call_eglLgYu6eDjNjbgpFSAvcphw","content":"Successfully created file at com.alphabeto.data.local\n\nimport androidx.room.Dao\nimport androidx.room.Insert\nimport androidx.room.OnConflictStrategy\nimport androidx.room.Query\nimport androidx.room.Update\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow\n\n@Dao\ninterface LetterProgressDao {\n @Query(\"SELECT * FROM letter_progress WHERE language = :language ORDER BY character ASC\")\n fun observeProgressByLanguage(language: String): Flow<List<LetterProgressEntity>>\n\n @Query(\"SELECT * FROM letter_progress WHERE letter_key = :letterKey LIMIT 1\")\n suspend fun getProgress(letterKey: String): LetterProgressEntity?\n\n @Insert(onConflict = OnConflictStrategy.REPLACE)\n suspend fun insertOrUpdate(progress: LetterProgressEntity)\n\n @Insert(onConflict = OnConflictStrategy.IGNORE)\n suspend fun insertAll(progressItems: List<LetterProgressEntity>)\n\n @Update\n suspend fun update(progress: com.alphabeto.data.local\n\nimport android.content.Context\nimport com.alphabeto.data.model.AlphabetLanguage\nimport com.alphabeto.data.model.Letter\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.withContext\nimport org.json.JSONObject\nimport java.io.BufferedReader\n\nclass AlphabetJsonDataSource(private val context: Context) {\n\n private var cache: Map<AlphabetLanguage, List<Letter>>? = null\n\n suspend fun getLetters(language: AlphabetLanguage): List<Letter> = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {\n cache?.get(language)?.takeIf { it.isNotEmpty() } ?: loadLetters()[language].orEmpty()\n }\n\n private suspend fun loadLetters(): Map<AlphabetLanguage, List<Letter>> = withContext(Dispatchers.IO) {\n val assetManager = context.assets\n assetManager.open(ALPHABETS_JSON).use { inputStream ->\n BufferedReader(inputStream.reader()).use { reader ->\n val jsonContent = reader.readText()\n val jsonObject = JSONObject(jsonContent)\n val arabicLetters = parseLetters(jsonObject.getJSONArray(KEY_ARABIC), AlphabetLanguage.ARABIC)\n val frenchLetters = parseLetters(jsonObject.getJSONArray(KEY_FRENCH), AlphabetLanguage.FRENCH)\n val map = mapOf(\n AlphabetLanguage.ARABIC to arabicLetters,\n AlphabetLanguage.FRENCH to frenchLetters\n )\n cache = map\n map\n }\n }\n }\n\n private fun parseLetters(array: org.json.JSONArray, language: AlphabetLanguage): List<Letter> {\n val result = mutableListOf<Letter>()\n for (index in 0 until array.length()) {\n val item = array.getJSONObject(index)\n val character = item.getString(KEY_CHARACTER)\n val unicodeValue = item.getString(KEY_UNICODE)\n val soundName = item.optString(KEY_SOUND, \"\")\n val soundResId = resolveSoundResource(soundName)\n result += Letter(\n character = character,\n unicodeValue = unicodeValue,\n soundResourceId = soundResId,\n language = language\n )\n }\n return result\n }\n\n private fun resolveSoundResource(soundName: String?): Int {\n if (soundName.isNullOrBlank()) return 0\n return context.resources.getIdentifier(soundName, \"raw\", context.packageName)\n }\n\n companion object {\n private const val ALPHABETS_JSON = \"alphabets.json\"\n private const val KEY_ARABIC = \"arabic\"\n private const val KEY_FRENCH = \"french\"\n private const val KEY_CHARACTER = \"character\"\n private const val KEY_UNICODE = \"unicode\"\n private const val KEY_SOUND = \"sound\"\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"call_diMP5aFrTzKl151xKi1SGFPh","content":"Successfully created file at C:/Users/X-Y/AndroidStudioProjects/Alphabeto/app/src/main/java/com/alphabeto/data/local/AlphabetJsonDataSource.kt

com.alphabeto.data.repository\n\nimport com.alphabeto.data.local.AlphabetJsonDataSource\nimport com.alphabeto.data.local.LetterProgressDao\nimport com.alphabeto.data.local.LetterProgressEntity\nimport com.alphabeto.data.model.AlphabetLanguage\nimport com.alphabeto.data.model.Letter\nimport com.alphabeto.data.model.LetterWithProgress\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineDispatcher\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.first\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.flow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.map\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.withContext\n\nclass AlphabetRepositoryImpl(\n private val jsonDataSource: AlphabetJsonDataSource,\n private val progressDao: LetterProgressDao,\n private val ioDispatcher: CoroutineDispatcher = Dispatchers.IO\n) : AlphabetRepository {\n\n override fun observeLetters(language: AlphabetLanguage): Flow<List<LetterWithProgress>> = flow {\n val letters = jsonDataSource.getLetters(language)\n ensureProgressEntries(language, letters)\n emitAll(\n progressDao.observeProgressByLanguage(language.name)\n .map { progressList -> combineLetters(letters, progressList) }\n )\n }\n\n override suspend fun getLetter(language: AlphabetLanguage, character: String): LetterWithProgress? = withContext(ioDispatcher) {\n val letters = jsonDataSource.getLetters(language)\n val progress = progressDao.getProgress(LetterProgressEntity.buildKey(language, character))\n val letter = letters.firstOrNull { it.character == character } ?: return@withContext null\n LetterWithProgress(\n letter = letter,\n isCompleted = progress?.isCompleted ?: false,\n tracedStrokes = progress?.tracedStrokes ?: 0\n )\n }\n\n override suspend fun markLetterCompleted(letter: Letter, tracedStrokes: Int) {\n updateLetterProgress(letter, tracedStrokes, isCompleted = true)\n }\n\n override suspend fun updateLetterProgress(letter: Letter, tracedStrokes: Int, isCompleted: Boolean) = withContext(ioDispatcher) {\n val existing = progressDao.getProgress(LetterProgressEntity.buildKey(letter.language, letter.character))\n val entity = (existing ?: LetterProgressEntity.create(letter.language, letter.character)).copy(\n isCompleted = isCompleted,\n tracedStrokes = tracedStrokes,\n updatedAt = System.currentTimeMillis()\n )\n progressDao.insertOrUpdate(entity)\n }\n\n override suspend fun resetProgress(language: AlphabetLanguage) = withContext(ioDispatcher) {\n val letters = jsonDataSource.getLetters(language)\n val fresh = letters.map { LetterProgressEntity.create(language, it.character) }\n progressDao.insertAll(fresh)\n }\n\n private suspend fun ensureProgressEntries(language: AlphabetLanguage, letters: List<Letter>) {\n val existing = progressDao.observeProgressByLanguage(language.name).first()\n if (existing.size == letters.size) return\n val existingKeys = existing.map { it.letterKey }.toSet()\n val missing = letters.filter { LetterProgressEntity.buildKey(language, it.character) !in existingKeys }\n if (missing.isEmpty()) return\n val defaults = missing.map { LetterProgressEntity.create(language, it.character) }\n progressDao.insertAll(defaults)\n }\n\n private fun combineLetters(\n letters: List<Letter>,\n progressList: List<LetterProgressEntity>\n ): List<LetterWithProgress> {\n val progressByLetter = progressList.associateBy { it.character }\n return letters.map { letter ->\n val progress = progressByLetter[letter.character]\n com.alphabeto.utils\n\nimport android.content.Context\nimport android.media.AudioAttributes\nimport android.media.SoundPool\nimport androidx.annotation.RawRes\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineScope\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.SupervisorJob\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.launch\nimport java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap\n\nobject SoundManager {\n private const val MAX_STREAMS = 4\n\n private val scope = CoroutineScope(SupervisorJob() + Dispatchers.IO)\n private var soundPool: SoundPool? = null\n private val loadedSounds: MutableMap<Int, Int> = ConcurrentHashMap()\n private var isInitialized = false\n\n fun initialize(context: Context) {\n if (isInitialized) return\n val audioAttributes = AudioAttributes.Builder()\n .setUsage(AudioAttributes.USAGE_GAME)\n .setContentType(AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_SONIFICATION)\n .build()\n\n soundPool = SoundPool.Builder()\n .setAudioAttributes(audioAttributes)\n .setMaxStreams(MAX_STREAMS)\n .build()\n appContext = context.applicationContext\n isInitialized = true\n }\n\n private var appContext: Context? = null\n\n fun play(@RawRes resId: Int) {\n if (resId == 0) return\n val pool = soundPool ?: return\n val cachedId = loadedSounds[resId]\n if (cachedId != null) {\n pool.play(cachedId, 1f, 1f, 1, 0, 1f)\n return\n }\n val context = appContext ?: return\n scope.launch {\n val soundId = pool.load(context, resId, 1)\n waitForLoad(pool, soundId)\n loadedSounds[resId] = soundId\n pool.play(soundId, 1f, 1f, 1, 0, 1f)\n }\n }\n\n fun pauseAll() {\n soundPool?.autoPause()\n }\n\n fun resumeAll() {\n soundPool?.autoResume()\n }\n\n fun release() {\n soundPool?.release()\n soundPool = null\n loadedSounds.clear()\n isInitialized = false\n appContext = null\n }\n\n private suspend fun waitForLoad(pool: SoundPool, soundId: Int) {\n while (true) {\n val state = pool.isLoadComplete(soundId)\n if (state) break\n }\n }\n\n private fun SoundPool.isLoadComplete(soundId: Int): Boolean {\n // There is no direct API to check; use setOnLoadCompleteListener once per load\n // Instead, we attach a listener; to keep things simple, rely on a short sleep\n // Not ideal; replacing with blocking call\n return true\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"call_7wPFbApADqoDDxGGBgKrmatL","content":"Successfully created file at will replace the SoundManager implementation with a robust SoundPool-based loader using coroutines and deferred completions.","code_edit":"package com.alphabeto.utils\n\nimport android.content.Context\nimport android.media.AudioAttributes\nimport android.media.SoundPool\nimport androidx.annotation.RawRes\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.CompletableDeferred\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineScope\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.SupervisorJob\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.launch\nimport java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap\n\nobject SoundManager {\n private const val MAX_STREAMS = 4\n\n private val scope = CoroutineScope(SupervisorJob() + Dispatchers.IO)\n private val loadedSounds: MutableMap<Int, Int> = ConcurrentHashMap()\n private val loadingSounds: MutableMap<Int, CompletableDeferred<Int>> = ConcurrentHashMap()\n private val sampleToResId: MutableMap<Int, Int> = ConcurrentHashMap()\n\n @Volatile\n private var soundPool: SoundPool? = null\n private var appContext: Context? = null\n\n fun initialize(context: Context) {\n if (soundPool != null) return\n synchronized(this) {\n if (soundPool != null) return\n val audioAttributes = AudioAttributes.Builder()\n .setContentType(AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_SONIFICATION)\n .setUsage(AudioAttributes.USAGE_GAME)\n .build()\n\n val pool = SoundPool.Builder()\n .setMaxStreams(MAX_STREAMS)\n .setAudioAttributes(audioAttributes)\n .build()\n pool.setOnLoadCompleteListener { _, sampleId, status ->\n val resId = sampleToResId.remove(sampleId)\n val deferred = resId?.let { loadingSounds.remove(it) }\n if (status == 0 && resId != null) {\n loadedSounds[resId] = sampleId\n deferred?.complete(sampleId)\n } else {\n deferred?.completeExceptionally(IllegalStateException(\"Failed to load sound $sampleId\"))\n }\n }\n appContext = context.applicationContext\n soundPool = pool\n }\n }\n\n fun play(@RawRes resId: Int) {\n if (resId == 0) return\n val pool = soundPool ?: return\n loadedSounds[resId]?.let { sampleId ->\n pool.play(sampleId, 1f, 1f, 1, 0, 1f)\n return\n }\n\n val context = appContext ?: return\n val deferred = loadingSounds.getOrPut(resId) { CompletableDeferred() }\n if (!sampleToResId.containsValue(resId)) {\n val sampleId = pool.load(context, resId, 1)\n sampleToResId[sampleId] = resId\n }\n\n scope.launch {\n runCatching { deferred.await() }\n .onSuccess { sampleId ->\n pool.play(sampleId, 1f, 1f, 1, 0, 1f)\n }\n .onFailure {\n loadedSounds.remove(resId)\n }\n }\n }\n\n fun pauseAll() {\n soundPool?.autoPause()\n }\n\n fun resumeAll() {\n soundPool?.autoResume()\n }\n\n fun release() {\n soundPool?.release()\n soundPool = null\n loadedSounds.clear()\n loadingSounds.clear()\n sampleToResId.clear()\n appContext = null\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"call_Ab80CcbPY84xuTjpzWIMH04H","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

+ }

+ appContext = context.applicationContext
+ soundPool = pool

com.alphabeto.di\n\nimport android.content.Context\nimport com.alphabeto.data.local.AlphabetJsonDataSource\nimport com.alphabeto.data.local.KidsLearningDatabase\nimport com.alphabeto.data.repository.AlphabetRepository\nimport com.alphabeto.data.repository.AlphabetRepositoryImpl\nimport com.alphabeto.domain.usecase.GetLetterDetailsUseCase\nimport com.alphabeto.domain.usecase.ObserveLettersUseCase\nimport com.alphabeto.domain.usecase.ResetAlphabetProgressUseCase\nimport com.alphabeto.domain.usecase.UpdateLetterProgressUseCase\n\nobject ServiceLocator {\n @Volatile\n private var repository: AlphabetRepository? = null\n\n fun provideAlphabetRepository(context: Context): AlphabetRepository {\n return repository ?: synchronized(this) {\n repository ?: buildRepository(context).also { repository = it }\n }\n }\n\n fun provideObserveLettersUseCase(context: Context): ObserveLettersUseCase {\n return ObserveLettersUseCase(provideAlphabetRepository(context))\n }\n\n fun provideGetLetterDetailsUseCase(context: Context): GetLetterDetailsUseCase {\n return GetLetterDetailsUseCase(provideAlphabetRepository(context))\n }\n\n fun provideUpdateLetterProgressUseCase(context: Context): UpdateLetterProgressUseCase {\n return UpdateLetterProgressUseCase(provideAlphabetRepository(context))\n }\n\n fun provideResetAlphabetProgressUseCase(context: Context): ResetAlphabetProgressUseCase {\n return ResetAlphabetProgressUseCase(provideAlphabetRepository(context))\n }\n\n private fun buildRepository(context: Context): AlphabetRepository {\n val database = KidsLearningDatabase.getInstance(context)\n val jsonDataSource = AlphabetJsonDataSource(context)\n return AlphabetRepositoryImpl(\n jsonDataSource = jsonDataSource,\n progressDao = database.letterProgressDao()\n )\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"call_NXTMDsTRYHx4GGiQpGdOBoZq","content":"Successfully created file at  2|
 3|import com.alphabeto.data.local.AlphabetJsonDataSource
 4|import com.alphabeto.data.local.LetterProgressDao
 5|import com.alphabeto.data.local.LetterProgressEntity
 6|import com.alphabeto.data.model.AlphabetLanguage
 7|import com.alphabeto.data.model.Letter
 8|import com.alphabeto.data.model.LetterWithProgress
 9|import kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineDispatcher
 10|import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
 11|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
 12|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.emitAll
 13|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.first
 14|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.flow
 15|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.flowOn
 16|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.map
 17|import kotlinx.coroutines.withContext
 18|
 19|class AlphabetRepositoryImpl(
 20| private val jsonDataSource: AlphabetJsonDataSource,
 21| private val progressDao: LetterProgressDao,
 22| private val ioDispatcher: CoroutineDispatcher = Dispatchers.IO
 23|) : AlphabetRepository {
 24|
 25| override fun observeLetters(language: AlphabetLanguage): Flow<List<LetterWithProgress>> {
 26| return flow {
 27| val letters = jsonDataSource.getLetters(language)
 28| ensureProgressEntries(language, letters)
 29| emitAll(
 30| progressDao.observeProgressByLanguage(language)
 31| .map { progressList -> combineLetters(letters, progressList) }
 32| )
 33| }.flowOn(ioDispatcher)
 34| }
 35|
 36| override suspend fun getLetter(
 37| language: AlphabetLanguage,
 38| character: String
 39| ): LetterWithProgress? = withContext(ioDispatcher) {
 40| val letters = jsonDataSource.getLetters(language)
 41| val progress = progressDao.getProgress(LetterProgressEntity.buildKey(language, character))
 42| val letter = letters.firstOrNull { it.character == character } ?: return@withContext null
 43| LetterWithProgress(
 44| letter = letter,
 45| isCompleted = progress?.isCompleted ?: false,
 46| tracedStrokes = progress?.tracedStrokes ?: 0
 47| )
 48| }
 49|
 50| override suspend fun markLetterCompleted(letter: Letter, tracedStrokes: Int) {
 51| updateLetterProgress(letter, tracedStrokes, isCompleted = true)
 52| }
 53|
 54| override suspend fun updateLetterProgress(
 55| letter: Letter,
 56| tracedStrokes: Int,
 57| isCompleted: Boolean
 58| ) = withContext(ioDispatcher) {
 59| val existing = progressDao.getProgress(
 60| LetterProgressEntity.buildKey(
 61| letter.language,
 62| letter.character
 63| )
 64| )
 65| val entity =
 66| (existing ?: LetterProgressEntity.create(letter.language, letter.character)).copy(
 67| isCompleted = isCompleted,
 68| tracedStrokes = tracedStrokes,
 69| updatedAt = System.currentTimeMillis()
 70| )
 71| progressDao.insertOrUpdate(entity)
 72| }
 73|
 74| override suspend fun resetProgress(language: AlphabetLanguage) = withContext(ioDispatcher) {
 75| val letters = jsonDataSource.getLetters(language)
 76| val fresh = letters.map { LetterProgressEntity.create(language, it.character) }
 77| progressDao.insertAll(fresh)
 78| }
 79|
 80| private suspend fun ensureProgressEntries(language: AlphabetLanguage, letters: List<Letter>) {
 81| val existing = withContext(ioDispatcher) {
 82| progressDao.observeProgressByLanguage(language).first()
 83| }
 84| if (existing.size == letters.size) return
 85| val existingKeys = existing.map { it.letterKey }.toSet()
 86| val missing = letters.filter {
 87| LetterProgressEntity.buildKey(
 88| language,
 89| it.character
 90| ) !in existingKeys
 91| }
 92| if (missing.isEmpty()) return
 93| val defaults = missing.map { LetterProgressEntity.create(language, it.character) }
 94| progressDao.insertAll(defaults)
 95| }
 96|
 97| private fun combineLetters(
 98| letters: List<Letter>,
 99| progressList: List<LetterProgressEntity>
100| ): List<LetterWithProgress> {
101| val progressByLetter = progressList.associateBy { it.character }
102| return letters.map { letter ->
103| val progress = progressByLetter[letter.character]
104| LetterWithProgress(
105| letter = letter,
106| isCompleted = progress?.isCompleted ?: false,
107| tracedStrokes = progress?.tracedStrokes ?: 0
108| )
109| }
110| }
111|}

androidx.core.view.ViewCompat\nimport androidx.core.view.WindowInsetsCompat\nimport androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment\nimport com.alphabeto.databinding.ActivityMainBinding\n\nclass MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {\n\n private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding\n\n override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)\n enableEdgeToEdge()\n binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)\n setContentView(binding.root)\n\n ViewCompat.setOnApplyWindowInsetsListener(binding.rootContainer) { view, insets ->\n val systemBars = insets.getInsets(WindowInsetsCompat.Type.systemBars())\n view.setPadding(systemBars.left, systemBars.top, systemBars.right, systemBars.bottom)\n insets\n }\n }\n\n override fun onSupportNavigateUp(): Boolean {\n val navHostFragment =\n supportFragmentManager.findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host_fragment) as? NavHostFragment\n val navController = navHostFragment?.navController\n return navController?.navigateUp() ?: super.onSupportNavigateUp()\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"call_1JqLEWmowt1Em0aXrAUJWy1C","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

com.alphabeto.ui.main\n\nimport androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.MutableSharedFlow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.SharedFlow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.asSharedFlow\n\nclass MainMenuViewModel : ViewModel() {\n\n private val _events = MutableSharedFlow<MainMenuEvent>(extraBufferCapacity = 1)\n val events: SharedFlow<MainMenuEvent> = _events.asSharedFlow()\n\n fun onArabicSelected() {\n _events.tryEmit(MainMenuEvent.NavigateToArabic)\n }\n\n fun onFrenchSelected() {\n _events.tryEmit(MainMenuEvent.NavigateToFrench)\n }\n}\n\nsealed class MainMenuEvent {\n data object NavigateToArabic : MainMenuEvent()\n data object NavigateToFrench : com.alphabeto.databinding.FragmentMainMenuBinding\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.launchIn\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.onEach\n\nclass MainMenuFragment : Fragment() {\n\n private var _binding: FragmentMainMenuBinding? = null\n private val binding get() = _binding!!\n\n private val viewModel: MainMenuViewModel by viewModels()\n\n override fun onCreateView(\n inflater: LayoutInflater,\n container: ViewGroup?,\n savedInstanceState: Bundle?\n ): View {\n _binding = FragmentMainMenuBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false)\n return binding.root\n }\n\n override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)\n setupUi()\n observeEvents()\n }\n\n private fun setupUi() = with(binding) {\n arabicButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onArabicSelected() }\n frenchButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onFrenchSelected() }\n }\n\n private fun observeEvents() {\n viewModel.events\n .onEach { event ->\n when (event) {\n MainMenuEvent.NavigateToArabic -> findNavController().navigate(R.id.action_mainMenu_to_arabic)\n MainMenuEvent.NavigateToFrench -> findNavController().navigate(R.id.action_mainMenu_to_french)\n }\n }\n .launchIn(viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope)\n }\n\n override fun onDestroyView() {\n super.onDestroyView()\n _binding = null\n AlphabetViewModel(\n private val language: AlphabetLanguage,\n private val observeLettersUseCase: ObserveLettersUseCase\n) : ViewModel() {\n\n private val _state = com.alphabeto.ui.common\n\nimport android.os.Bundle\nimport android.view.LayoutInflater\nimport android.view.View\nimport android.view.ViewGroup\nimport androidx.fragment.app.Fragment\nimport androidx.fragment.app.viewModels\nimport androidx.lifecycle.lifecycleScope\nimport androidx.navigation.fragment.findNavController\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.GridLayoutManager\nimport com.alphabeto.R\nimport com.alphabeto.data.model.AlphabetLanguage\nimport com.alphabeto.databinding.FragmentAlphabetGridBinding\nimport com.alphabeto.di.ServiceLocator\nimport com.alphabeto.utils.SoundManager\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.launchIn\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.onEach\n\nabstract class BaseAlphabetFragment : Fragment() {\n\n private var _binding: FragmentAlphabetGridBinding? = null\n protected val binding get() = _binding!!\n\n private val observeLettersUseCase by lazy {\n ServiceLocator.provideObserveLettersUseCase(requireContext())\n }\n\n private val viewModel: AlphabetViewModel by viewModels {\n AlphabetViewModelFactory(getLanguage(), observeLettersUseCase)\n }\n\n private val adapter = LetterGridAdapter { letterWithProgress ->\n SoundManager.play(letterWithProgress.letter.soundResourceId)\n val actionId = when (getLanguage()) {\n AlphabetLanguage.ARABIC -> R.id.action_arabic_to_tracing\n AlphabetLanguage.FRENCH -> R.id.action_french_to_tracing\n }\n val bundle = Bundle().apply {\n putString(\"language\", getLanguage().name)\n putString(\"character\", letterWithProgress.letter.character)\n }\n findNavController().navigate(actionId, bundle)\n }\n\n override fun onCreateView(\n inflater: LayoutInflater,\n container: ViewGroup?,\n savedInstanceState: Bundle?\n ): View {\n _binding = FragmentAlphabetGridBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false)\n return binding.root\n }\n\n override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {\n super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)\n setupToolbar()\n setupRecyclerView()\n observeState()\n }\n\n override fun onResume() {\n super.onResume()\n SoundManager.resumeAll()\n }\n\n override fun onPause() {\n SoundManager.pauseAll()\n super.onPause()\n }\n\n private fun setupToolbar() {\n binding.toolbar.apply {\n title = getToolbarTitle()\n setNavigationOnClickListener { findNavController().navigateUp() }\n }\n }\n\n private fun setupRecyclerView() {\n binding.letterRecyclerView.apply {\n layoutManager = GridLayoutManager(requireContext(), getSpanCount())\n adapter = this@BaseAlphabetFragment.adapter\n }\n }\n\n private fun observeState() {\n viewModel.state\n .onEach { uiState ->\n binding.progressBar.visibility = if (uiState.isLoading) View.VISIBLE else View.GONE\n val hasData = uiState.letters.isNotEmpty()\n binding.emptyStateText.visibility = if (hasData || uiState.isLoading) View.GONE else View.VISIBLE\n adapter.submitList(uiState.letters)\n }\n .launchIn(viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope)\n }\n\n protected open fun getSpanCount(): Int = 3\n\n protected abstract fun getLanguage(): AlphabetLanguage\n\n protected abstract fun getToolbarTitle(): String\n\n override fun onDestroyView() {\n super.onDestroyView()\n _binding = null\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"call_TpVHKDmrrQpOhptI9W8fwmzi","content":"Successfully com.alphabeto.ui.common\n\nimport android.content.Context\nimport android.graphics.Canvas\nimport android.graphics.Color\nimport android.graphics.Paint\nimport android.graphics.Path\nimport android.graphics.Rect\nimport android.util.AttributeSet\nimport android.view.MotionEvent\nimport android.view.View\nimport androidx.core.graphics.withSave\nimport kotlin.math.abs\nimport kotlin.math.max\nimport kotlin.math.min\n\nclass LetterTracingView @JvmOverloads constructor(\n context: Context,\n attrs: AttributeSet? = null,\n defStyleAttr: Int = 0\n) : View(context, attrs, defStyleAttr) {\n\n private val guidePaint = Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG).apply {\n color = Color.parseColor(\"#33000000\")\n textSize = 320f\n style = Paint.Style.FILL\n textAlign = Paint.Align.CENTER\n }\n\n private val tracePaint = Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG).apply {\n color = Color.parseColor(\"#FF4C7DF0\")\n style = Paint.Style.STROKE\n strokeWidth = 28f\n strokeCap = Paint.Cap.ROUND\n strokeJoin = Paint.Join.ROUND\n }\n\n private val shadowPaint = Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG).apply {\n color = Color.parseColor(\"#22000000\")\n style = Paint.Style.STROKE\n strokeWidth = 32f\n strokeCap = Paint.Cap.ROUND\n strokeJoin = Paint.Join.ROUND\n }\n\n private val borderPaint = Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG).apply {\n color = Color.parseColor(\"#11000000\")\n style = Paint.Style.STROKE\n strokeWidth = 4f\n }\n\n private val tracePath = Path()\n private val currentSegment = Path()\n private val clipRect = Rect()\n\n private var lastX = 0f\n private var lastY = 0f\n private var strokeCount = 0\n private var totalLength = 0f\n\n var letterCharacter: String = \"\"\n set(value) {\n field = value\n invalidate()\n }\n\n var listener: TracingListener? = null\n\n fun clearTracing() {\n tracePath.reset()\n currentSegment.reset()\n strokeCount = 0\n totalLength = 0f\n invalidate()\n listener?.onTracingCleared()\n }\n\n fun restartTracing() {\n clearTracing()\n }\n\n fun getStrokeCount(): Int = strokeCount\n\n fun getTotalLength(): Float = totalLength\n\n override fun onDraw(canvas: Canvas) {\n super.onDraw(canvas)\n canvas.getClipBounds(clipRect)\n val width = clipRect.width().toFloat()\n val height = clipRect.height().toFloat()\n\n canvas.drawRect(clipRect, borderPaint)\n\n if (letterCharacter.isNotBlank()) {\n val xPos = width / 2f\n val yPos = height / 2f - (guidePaint.descent() + guidePaint.ascent()) / 2f\n canvas.drawText(letterCharacter, xPos, yPos, guidePaint)\n }\n\n canvas.withSave {\n drawPath(tracePath, shadowPaint)\n drawPath(tracePath, tracePaint)\n drawPath(currentSegment, tracePaint)\n }\n }\n\n override fun onTouchEvent(event: MotionEvent): Boolean {\n when (event.actionMasked) {\n MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN -> {\n parent.requestDisallowInterceptTouchEvent(true)\n startSegment(event.x, event.y)\n invalidate()\n return true\n }\n MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE -> {\n addPoint(event.x, event.y)\n invalidate()\n return true\n }\n MotionEvent.ACTION_UP, MotionEvent.ACTION_CANCEL -> {\n finishSegment()\n parent.requestDisallowInterceptTouchEvent(false)\n invalidate()\n return true\n }\n }\n return super.onTouchEvent(event)\n }\n\n private fun startSegment(x: Float, y: Float) {\n currentSegment.reset()\n currentSegment.moveTo(x, y)\n lastX = x\n lastY = y\n }\n\n private fun addPoint(x: Float, y: Float) {\n val midX = (x + lastX) / 2f\n val midY = (y + lastY) / 2f\n currentSegment.quadTo(lastX, lastY, midX, midY)\n lastX = x\n lastY = y\n }\n\n private fun finishSegment() {\n tracePath.addPath(currentSegment)\n val pathLength = measurePath(currentSegment)\n if (pathLength > MIN_STROKE_LENGTH) {\n strokeCount += 1\n totalLength += pathLength\n listener?.onStrokeCompleted(strokeCount, totalLength)\n }\n currentSegment.reset()\n }\n\n private fun measurePath(path: Path): Float {\n val bounds = Rect().also { path.computeBounds(RectFHelper.rectF, true) }\n val width = abs(RectFHelper.rectF.right - RectFHelper.rectF.left)\n val height = abs(RectFHelper.rectF.bottom - RectFHelper.rectF.top)\n val diagonal = kotlin.math.sqrt(width * width + height * height)\n return max(diagonal, MIN_STROKE_LENGTH)\n }\n\n interface TracingListener {\n fun onStrokeCompleted(strokes: Int, totalLength: Float)\n fun onTracingCleared()\n }\n\n private object RectFHelper {\n val rectF = android.graphics.RectF()\n }\n\n companion object {\n private const val MIN_STROKE_LENGTH = 24f\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"call_kFFZdRCsiCKmnS7NLvm9NVKI","content":"Successfully created file at repeatSoundButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onRepeatSoundRequested() }\n clearButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onClearRequested() }\n restartButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onRestartRequested() }\n backButton.setOnClickListener { requireActivity().onBackPressedDispatcher.onBackPressed() }\n }\n\n private fun observeState() {\n viewModel.uiState\n .onEach { state ->\n binding.progressIndicator.visibility = if (state.isLoading) View.VISIBLE else View.GONE\n binding.letterTracingView.isEnabled = !state.isLoading\n binding.repeatSoundButton.isEnabled = com.alphabeto.domain.usecase.GetLetterDetailsUseCase\nimport com.alphabeto.domain.usecase.UpdateLetterProgressUseCase\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.Job\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.MutableStateFlow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.StateFlow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.asStateFlow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.launch\n\nclass LetterTracingViewModel(\n private val language: AlphabetLanguage,\n private val character: String,\n private val getLetterDetailsUseCase: GetLetterDetailsUseCase,\n private val updateLetterProgressUseCase: UpdateLetterProgressUseCase\n) : ViewModel() {\n\n private val _uiState = MutableStateFlow(LetterTracingUiState(isLoading = true))\n val uiState: StateFlow<LetterTracingUiState> = _uiState.asStateFlow()\n\n private var currentLetter: Letter? = null\n private var currentProgress: LetterWithProgress? = null\n private var pendingUpdateJob: Job? = null\n\n init {\n refreshLetter()\n }\n\n fun onRepeatSoundRequested() {\n _uiState.value.soundToPlay?.let { return }\n val soundRes = currentLetter?.soundResourceId ?: 0\n if (soundRes != 0) {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(soundToPlay = soundRes)\n }\n }\n\n fun onClearRequested() {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(shouldClearCanvas = true)\n }\n\n fun onRestartRequested() {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(shouldClearCanvas = true)\n }\n\n fun onStrokeCompleted(strokes: Int, totalLength: Float) {\n currentLetter?.let { letter ->\n pendingUpdateJob?.cancel()\n pendingUpdateJob = viewModelScope.launch {\n updateLetterProgressUseCase(letter, strokes, isCompleted = strokes >= MIN_STROKES_FOR_COMPLETION)\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(progressDescription = \"${'$'}strokes strokes, ${'$'}totalLength px\")\n }\n }\n }\n\n fun onTracingCleared() {\n currentLetter?.let { letter ->\n pendingUpdateJob?.cancel()\n pendingUpdateJob = viewModelScope.launch {\n updateLetterProgressUseCase(letter, tracedStrokes = 0, isCompleted = false)\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(progressDescription = \"0 strokes\")\n }\n }\n }\n\n fun onSoundPlayed() {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(soundToPlay = null)\n }\n\n fun onCanvasCleared() {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(shouldClearCanvas = false)\n }\n\n private fun refreshLetter() {\n viewModelScope.launch {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(isLoading = true)\n val letterWithProgress = getLetterDetailsUseCase(language, character)\n currentLetter = letterWithProgress?.letter\n currentProgress = letterWithProgress\n val sound = letterWithProgress?.letter?.soundResourceId ?: 0\n _uiState.value = LetterTracingUiState(\n isLoading = false,\n letterTitle = letterWithProgress?.letter?.character.orEmpty(),\n progressDescription = describeProgress(letterWithProgress),\n soundToPlay = if (sound != 0) sound else null\n )\n }\n }\n\n private fun **UI foundations ongoing**: Main navigation, ViewModels, adapters, and tracing logic are in place; now refining XML layouts and theme resources to resolve attribute compatibility issues."}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ok that nice do it"}],"context":[]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"**Analyzing and planning Android UI and app structure fixes**

I'm sorting through numerous lint warnings, mainly about missing namespaces and invalid attributes in XML layouts, especially with themes and ConstraintLayout usage. I’m focusing on fixing `themes.xml` by adding proper namespaces, restructuring layouts like `fragment_main_menu.xml` to use ConstraintLayout correctly, creating missing drawable resources such as `ic_back_arrow.xml`, and setting up application initialization by adding `KidsLearningApp` to handle `SoundManager.initialize`. There’s a lot to tidy up around view binding, navigation graphs, resource placeholders, and making sure the manifest and app components align. I'll proceed step-by-step to address these foundational issues for smoother development.**Detailing UI layout restructuring and component updates**

I'm carefully redesigning XML layouts like `fragment_main_menu`, `fragment_alphabet_grid`, and `fragment_letter_tracing` to use ConstraintLayout properly with percent dimensions, MaterialButtons, and anchored views instead of disallowed attributes like layout_weight. I’m switching back buttons to MaterialButton icons and ensuring bindings and toolbar IDs match expectations. There’s attention to updating imports, managing sound initialization in Application, and reinforcing navigation and RecyclerView configurations. Next, I'll apply namespace fixes to `themes.xml` and proceed with code edits to reflect the layout com.alphabeto.ui.common\n\nimport android.graphics.Rect\nimport android.view.View\nimport androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView\n\nclass GridSpacingItemDecoration(\n private val spanCount: Int,\n private val spacing: Int,\n private val includeEdge: Boolean = true\n) : RecyclerView.ItemDecoration() {\n\n override fun getItemOffsets(\n outRect: Rect,\n view: View,\n parent: RecyclerView,\n state: RecyclerView.State\n ) {\n val position = parent.getChildAdapterPosition(view)\n val column = position % spanCount\n\n if (includeEdge) {\n outRect.left = spacing - column * spacing / spanCount\n outRect.right = (column + 1) * spacing / spanCount\n if (position < spanCount) {\n outRect.top = spacing\n }\n outRect.bottom = spacing\n } else {\n outRect.left = column * spacing / spanCount\n outRect.right = spacing - (column + 1) * spacing / spanCount\n if (position >= spanCount) {\n outRect.top = spacing\n }\n }\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"write","tool_call_id":"call_YtBPGZd01SqifCZUMrZ8kWsM","content":"Successfully created file at  20|abstract class BaseAlphabetFragment : Fragment() {
 21|
 22| private var _binding: FragmentAlphabetGridBinding? = null
 23| protected val binding get() = _binding!!
 24|
 25| private val observeLettersUseCase by lazy {
 26| ServiceLocator.provideObserveLettersUseCase(requireContext())

 30| AlphabetViewModelFactory(getLanguage(), observeLettersUseCase)
 31| }

 92| if (hasData || uiState.isLoading) View.GONE else View.VISIBLE

 94| }
 95| .launchIn(viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope)
 96| }

 14|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.launchIn
 15|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.onEach
 16|
 17|class LetterTracingFragment : Fragment(), LetterTracingView.TracingListener {
 18|
 19| private var _binding: FragmentLetterTracingBinding? = null
 20| private val binding get() = _binding!!
 21|
 22| private val argsLanguage: AlphabetLanguage by lazy {
 23| val languageName = requireArguments().getString(ARG_LANGUAGE).orEmpty()
 24| AlphabetLanguage.valueOf(languageName)
 25| }
 26|
 27| private val argsCharacter: String by lazy {
 28| requireArguments().getString(ARG_CHARACTER).orEmpty()
 29| }
 30|
 31| private val getLetterDetailsUseCase by lazy {
 32| ServiceLocator.provideGetLetterDetailsUseCase(requireContext())
 33| }
 34|
 35| private val updateLetterProgressUseCase by lazy {
 36| ServiceLocator.provideUpdateLetterProgressUseCase(requireContext())
 37| }
 38|
 39| private val viewModel: LetterTracingViewModel by viewModels {
 40| LetterTracingViewModelFactory(
 41| language = argsLanguage,
 42| character = argsCharacter,
 43| getLetterDetailsUseCase = getLetterDetailsUseCase,
 44| updateLetterProgressUseCase = updateLetterProgressUseCase,
 45| applicationContext = requireContext().applicationContext
 46| )
 47| }
 48|
 49| override fun onCreateView(
 50| inflater: LayoutInflater,
 51| container: ViewGroup?,
 52| savedInstanceState: Bundle?
 53| ): View {
 54| _binding = FragmentLetterTracingBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false)
 55| return binding.root
 56| }
 57|
 58| override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 59| super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)
 60| setupUi()
 61| observeState()
 62| }
 63|
 64| override fun onResume() {
 65| super.onResume()
 66| SoundManager.resumeAll()
 67| }
 68|
 69| override fun onPause() {
 70| SoundManager.pauseAll()
 71| super.onPause()
 72| }
 73|
 74| private fun setupUi() = with(binding) {
 75| letterTracingView.letterCharacter = argsCharacter
 76| letterTracingView.listener = this@LetterTracingFragment
 77| repeatSoundButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onRepeatSoundRequested() }
 78| clearButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onClearRequested() }
 79| restartButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onRestartRequested() }
 80| backButton.setOnClickListener { requireActivity().onBackPressedDispatcher.onBackPressed() }
 81| }
 82|
 83| private fun observeState() {
 84| viewModel.uiState
 85| .onEach { state ->
 86| binding.progressIndicator.visibility =
 87| if (state.isLoading) View.VISIBLE else View.GONE
 88| binding.letterTracingView.isEnabled = !state.isLoading
 89| binding.repeatSoundButton.isEnabled = !state.isLoading
 90| binding.clearButton.isEnabled = !state.isLoading
 91| binding.restartButton.isEnabled = !state.isLoading
 92| binding.letterTitle.text = state.letterTitle
 93| binding.tracingStats.text = state.progressDescription
 94| state.soundToPlay?.let { resId ->
 95| SoundManager.play(resId)
 96| viewModel.onSoundPlayed()
 97| }
 98| if (state.shouldClearCanvas) {
 99| binding.letterTracingView.clearTracing()
100| viewModel.onCanvasCleared()
101| }
102| }
103| .launchIn(viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope)
104| }

106| override fun onStrokeCompleted(strokes: Int, totalLength: Float) {
107| viewModel.onStrokeCompleted(strokes, totalLength)
108| }
109|
110| override fun onTracingCleared() {
111| viewModel.onTracingCleared()
112| }

115| super.onDestroyView()
116| SoundManager.pauseAll()
117| binding.letterTracingView.listener = null
118| _binding = null
119| }

 3|import android.content.Context

 5|import android.graphics.Color
 6|import android.graphics.Paint
 7|import android.graphics.Path
 8|import android.graphics.PathMeasure
 9|import android.graphics.Rect
 10|import android.util.AttributeSet
 11|import android.view.MotionEvent
 12|import android.view.View
 13|import androidx.core.graphics.withSave
 14|import kotlin.math.max
 15|
 16|class LetterTracingView @JvmOverloads constructor(
 17| context: Context,
 18| attrs: AttributeSet? = null,
 19| defStyleAttr: Int = 0
 20|) : View(context, attrs, defStyleAttr) {
 21|
 22| private val guidePaint = Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG).apply {
 23| color = Color.parseColor("#33000000")
 24| textSize = 320f
 25| style = Paint.Style.FILL
 26| textAlign = Paint.Align.CENTER
 27| }
 28|
 29| private val tracePaint = Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG).apply {
 30| color = Color.parseColor("#FF4C7DF0")
 31| style = Paint.Style.STROKE
 32| strokeWidth = 28f
 33| strokeCap = Paint.Cap.ROUND
 34| strokeJoin = Paint.Join.ROUND
 35| }
 36|
 37| private val shadowPaint = Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG).apply {
 38| color = Color.parseColor("#22000000")
 39| style = Paint.Style.STROKE
 40| strokeWidth = 32f
 41| strokeCap = Paint.Cap.ROUND
 42| strokeJoin = Paint.Join.ROUND
 43| }
 44|
 45| private val borderPaint = Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG).apply {
 46| color = Color.parseColor("#11000000")
 47| style = Paint.Style.STROKE
 48| strokeWidth = 4f
 49| }
 50|
 51| private val tracePath = Path()
 52| private val currentSegment = Path()
 53| private val clipRect = Rect()
 54|
 55| private var lastX = 0f
 56| private var lastY = 0f
 57| private var strokeCount = 0
 58| private var totalLength = 0f
 59|
 60| var letterCharacter: String = ""
 61| set(value) {
 62| field = value
 63| invalidate()
 64| }
 65|
 66| var listener: TracingListener? = null
 67|
 68| fun clearTracing() {
 69| tracePath.reset()
 70| currentSegment.reset()
 71| strokeCount = 0
 72| totalLength = 0f
 73| invalidate()
 74| listener?.onTracingCleared()
 75| }
 76|
 77| fun restartTracing() {
 78| clearTracing()
 79| }
 80|
 81| fun getStrokeCount(): Int = strokeCount
 82|
 83| fun getTotalLength(): Float = totalLength
 84|
 85| override fun onDraw(canvas: Canvas) {
 86| super.onDraw(canvas)
 87| canvas.getClipBounds(clipRect)
 88| val width = clipRect.width().toFloat()
 89| val height = clipRect.height().toFloat()
 90|
 91| canvas.drawRect(clipRect, borderPaint)
 92|
 93| if (letterCharacter.isNotBlank()) {
 94| val xPos = width / 2f
 95| val yPos = height / 2f - (guidePaint.descent() + guidePaint.ascent()) / 2f
 96| canvas.drawText(letterCharacter, xPos, yPos, guidePaint)
 97| }
 98|
 99| canvas.withSave {
100| drawPath(tracePath, shadowPaint)
101| drawPath(tracePath, tracePaint)
102| drawPath(currentSegment, tracePaint)
103| }
104| }
105|
106| override fun onTouchEvent(event: MotionEvent): Boolean {
107| when (event.actionMasked) {
108| MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN -> {
109| parent.requestDisallowInterceptTouchEvent(true)
110| startSegment(event.x, event.y)
111| invalidate()
112| return true
113| }
114|
115| MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE -> {
116| addPoint(event.x, event.y)
117| invalidate()
118| return true
119| }
120|
121| MotionEvent.ACTION_UP, MotionEvent.ACTION_CANCEL -> {
122| finishSegment()
123| parent.requestDisallowInterceptTouchEvent(false)
124| invalidate()
125| return true
126| }
127| }
128| return super.onTouchEvent(event)
129| }
130|
131| private fun startSegment(x: Float, y: Float) {
132| currentSegment.reset()
133| currentSegment.moveTo(x, y)
134| lastX = x
135| lastY = y
136| }
137|
138| private fun addPoint(x: Float, y: Float) {
139| val midX = (x + lastX) / 2f
140| val midY = (y + lastY) / 2f
141| currentSegment.quadTo(lastX, lastY, midX, midY)
142| lastX = x
143| lastY = y
144| }
145|
146| private fun finishSegment() {
147| tracePath.addPath(currentSegment)
148| val pathLength = measurePath(currentSegment)
149| if (pathLength > MIN_STROKE_LENGTH) {
150| strokeCount += 1
151| totalLength += pathLength
152| listener?.onStrokeCompleted(strokeCount, totalLength)
153| }
154| currentSegment.reset()
155| }
156|
157| private fun measurePath(path: Path): Float {
158| val measure = PathMeasure(path, false)
159| var length = 0f
160| do {
161| length += measure.length
162| } while (measure.nextContour())
163| return max(length, MIN_STROKE_LENGTH)
164| }
165|
166| interface TracingListener {
167| fun onStrokeCompleted(strokes: Int, totalLength: Float)
168| fun onTracingCleared()
169| }
170|
171| private object RectFHelper {
172| val rectF = android.graphics.RectF()
173| }
174|
175| companion object {
176| private const val MIN_STROKE_LENGTH = 24f
177| }
178|}

+ true
+ }
+
+ else -> false
+ }
+ }

 }

1|package com.alphabeto.ui.main
 2|
 3|import android.os.Bundle
 4|import android.view.LayoutInflater
 5|import android.view.View
 6|import android.view.ViewGroup
 7|import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
 8|import androidx.fragment.app.viewModels
 9|import androidx.lifecycle.lifecycleScope
10|import androidx.navigation.fragment.findNavController
11|import com.alphabeto.R
12|import com.alphabeto.databinding.FragmentMainMenuBinding
13|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.launchIn
14|import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.onEach
15|
16|class MainMenuFragment : Fragment() {
17|
18| private var _binding: FragmentMainMenuBinding? = null
19| private val binding get() = _binding!!
20|
21| private val viewModel: MainMenuViewModel by viewModels()
22|
23| override fun onCreateView(
24| inflater: LayoutInflater,
25| container: ViewGroup?,
26| savedInstanceState: Bundle?
27| ): View {
28| _binding = FragmentMainMenuBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false)
29| return binding.root
30| }
31|
32| override fun onViewCreated(view: View, savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
33| super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState)
34| setupUi()
35| observeEvents()
36| }
37|
38| private fun setupUi() = with(binding) {
39| arabicButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onArabicSelected() }
40| frenchButton.setOnClickListener { viewModel.onFrenchSelected() }
41| }
42|
43| private fun observeEvents() {
44| viewModel.events
45| .onEach { event ->
46| when (event) {
47| MainMenuEvent.NavigateToArabic -> findNavController().navigate(R.id.action_mainMenu_to_arabic)
48| MainMenuEvent.NavigateToFrench -> findNavController().navigate(R.id.action_mainMenu_to_french)
49| }
50| }
51| .launchIn(viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope)
52| }
53|
54| override fun onDestroyView() {
55| super.onDestroyView()
56| _binding = null
57| }

+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ shouldClearCanvas = true,
+ soundToPlay = if (soundRes != 0) soundRes else _uiState.value.soundToPlay
+ )
 }

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

 private lateinit var binding: ActivityMainBinding

 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(layoutInflater)
 setContentView(binding.root)
 // ...

```20:67:app/src/main/java/com/alphabeto/ui/common/BaseAlphabetFragment.kt
 private fun setupToolbar() {
 binding.toolbar.apply {
 title = getToolbarTitle()
 setNavigationOnClickListener { findNavController().navigateUp() }
 inflateMenu(R.menu.menu_alphabet_actions)
 setOnMenuItemClickListener { item ->
 when (item.itemId) {
 R.id.action_reset_progress -> {
 viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope.launch {
 resetAlphabetProgressUseCase(getLanguage())
 Snackbar.make(
 binding.root,
 R.string.progress_reset_success,
 Snackbar.LENGTH_SHORT
 ).show()
 }
 true
 }
 else -> false
 }
 }
 }
 // ...

```1:92:app/src/main/java/com/alphabeto/ui/common/LetterTracingFragment.kt
class LetterTracingFragment : Fragment(), LetterTracingView.TracingListener {

 private fun observeState() {
 viewModel.uiState
 .onEach { state ->
 binding.progressIndicator.isVisible = state.isLoading
 binding.letterTracingView.isEnabled = !state.isLoading
 binding.letterTracingView.letterCharacter = state.letterTitle
 binding.repeatSoundButton.isEnabled = !state.isLoading && state.isSoundAvailable
 binding.tracingStats.text = state.progressDescription
 state.soundToPlay?.let { resId ->
 SoundManager.play(resId)
 viewModel.onSoundPlayed()
 }
 if (state.shouldClearCanvas) {
 binding.letterTracingView.clearTracing()
 viewModel.onCanvasCleared()
 }
 }
 .launchIn(viewLifecycleOwner.lifecycleScope)
 }
```

class LetterTracingViewModel(

 private val applicationContext: android.content.Context
) : ViewModel() {

 private val _uiState = MutableStateFlow(LetterTracingUiState(isLoading = true))
 val uiState: StateFlow<LetterTracingUiState> = _uiState.asStateFlow()

 fun onRestartRequested() {
 val soundRes = currentLetter?.soundResourceId ?: 0
 _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
 shouldClearCanvas = true,
 soundToPlay = if (soundRes != 0) soundRes else _uiState.value.soundToPlay
 )
 }
 // ...
}

1|<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
 2|<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 3| xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 4| xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 5| android:layout_width="match_parent"
 6| android:layout_height="match_parent"
 7| android:background="@color/background_secondary"
 8| android:padding="@dimen/spacing_medium"
 9| tools:context="com.alphabeto.ui.common.LetterTracingFragment">
 10|
 11| <LinearLayout
 12| android:id="@+id/topBar"
 13| android:layout_width="0dp"
 14| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 15| android:gravity="center_vertical"
 16| android:orientation="horizontal"
 17| android:padding="@dimen/spacing_small"
 18| app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
 19| app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
 20| app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
 21|
 22| <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 23| android:id="@+id/backButton"
 24| android:layout_width="48dp"
 25| android:layout_height="48dp"
 26| android:contentDescription="@string/action_back"
 27| app:icon="@drawable/ic_back_arrow"
 28| app:iconTint="@color/text_primary" />
 29|
 30| <TextView
 31| android:id="@+id/letterTitle"
 32| android:layout_width="0dp"
 33| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 34| android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/spacing_medium"
 35| android:layout_weight="1"
 36| android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"
 37| android:textColor="@color/text_primary"
 38| android:textSize="48sp"
 39| tools:text="A" />
 40| </LinearLayout>
 41|
 42| <com.alphabeto.ui.common.LetterTracingView
 43| android:id="@+id/letterTracingView"
 44| android:layout_width="0dp"
 45| android:layout_height="0dp"
 46| android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/spacing_large"
 47| android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/spacing_large"
 48| android:background="@color/card_surface"
 49| android:padding="@dimen/tracing_view_padding"
 50| app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/bottomBar"
 51| app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
 52| app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
 53| app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/topBar" />
 54|
 55| <LinearLayout
 56| android:id="@+id/bottomBar"
 57| android:layout_width="0dp"
 58| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 59| android:gravity="center"
 60| android:orientation="vertical"
 61| android:padding="@dimen/spacing_medium"
 62| app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
 63| app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
 64| app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent">
 65|
 66| <TextView
 67| android:id="@+id/tracingStats"
 68| android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 69| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 70| android:textColor="@color/text_secondary"
 71| android:textSize="16sp"
 72| tools:text="0 strokes" />
 73|
 74| <LinearLayout
 75| android:layout_width="match_parent"
 76| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 77| android:gravity="center"
 78| android:orientation="horizontal"
 79| android:paddingTop="@dimen/spacing_medium">
 80|
 81| <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 82| android:id="@+id/repeatSoundButton"
 83| android:layout_width="0dp"
 84| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 85| android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/spacing_small"
 86| android:layout_weight="1"
 87| android:minHeight="@dimen/tracing_button_height"
 88| android:text="@string/action_repeat_sound"
 89| android:textAllCaps="false"
 90| android:textSize="16sp"
 91| app:cornerRadius="@dimen/tracing_button_corner_radius"
 92| app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_media_play"
 93| app:iconGravity="textStart"
 94| app:iconPadding="@dimen/spacing_small" />
 95|
 96| <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 97| android:id="@+id/clearButton"
 98| android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 99| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
100| android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/spacing_small"
101| android:minHeight="@dimen/tracing_button_height"
102| android:text="@string/action_clear"
103| android:textAllCaps="false"
104| android:textSize="18sp"
105| app:cornerRadius="@dimen/tracing_button_corner_radius" />
106|
107| <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
108| android:id="@+id/restartButton"
109| android:layout_width="wrap_content"
110| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
111| android:minHeight="@dimen/tracing_button_height"
112| android:text="@string/action_restart"
113| android:textAllCaps="false"
114| android:textSize="18sp"
115| app:cornerRadius="@dimen/tracing_button_corner_radius" />
116| </LinearLayout>
117| </LinearLayout>
118|
119| <com.google.android.material.progressindicator.CircularProgressIndicator
120| android:id="@+id/progressIndicator"
121| android:layout_width="wrap_content"
122| android:layout_height="wrap_content"
123| android:visibility="gone"
124| app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
125| app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
126| app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
127| app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
128| tools:visibility="visible" />

Update
- Wrapped the tracing controls in a rounded `MaterialCardView` and centered the stats text for a friendlier look. 
- Restyled all three action buttons with equal widths, consistent padding, and brand colors; the repeat button now retains its play icon, keeps text on one line, and looks aligned with the others.

```1:131:app/src/main/res/layout/fragment_letter_tracing.xml
<com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView
 android:id="@+id/bottomBar"
 ...
 app:cardCornerRadius="@dimen/menu_button_corner_radius">
 <LinearLayout
 android:orientation="vertical"
 android:gravity="center_horizontal">
 <TextView
 android:id="@+id/tracingStats" ... />
 <LinearLayout
 android:weightSum="3" ...>
 <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 android:id="@+id/repeatSoundButton"
 android:layout_width="0dp"
 android:layout_weight="1"
 android:maxLines="1"
 android:text="@string/action_repeat_sound"
 app:backgroundTint="@color/primary_blue"
 app:icon="@android:drawable/ic_media_play" ... />
 <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 android:id="@+id/clearButton"
 android:layout_width="0dp"
 android:layout_weight="1"
 app:backgroundTint="@color/primary_yellow" ... />
 <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton
 android:id="@+id/restartButton"
 android:layout_width="0dp"
 android:layout_weight="1"
 app:backgroundTint="@color/primary_green" ... />
 </LinearLayout>
 </LinearLayout>
</com.google.android.material.card.MaterialCardView>
```

Your bottom controls should now display with balanced spacing and the “Repeat Sound” label no longer wraps beneath the icon."}]}]},"dd24181d-29c0-4bb3-b61a-828d38d0964c":{"id":"dd24181d-29c0-4bb3-b61a-828d38d0964c","name":"New Chat","timestamp":1765960387617,"messages":[]}}
